issue.title: [Java] Support concating dense union vectors in batch
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7699](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7699). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After supporting the dense union vector, we need to support concating dense union vectors in batch.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7699?focusedCommentId=17107919) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6464
